title: Factory
excerpt: How to setup Google Home speakers in a new house.
html:
I was having trouble setting up my Google home speakers with the new wifi. The only way to fix it was to factory reset the speaker using these instructions.

It took a lot longer to figure out than it should have. I thought I factory reset, and it was still failing. Apparently my finger slipped off the button right before the 15 seconds was up, so it didn’t work the first time.

relatedPosts.title: Assembly
relatedPosts.html: Last week I was assembling a bunch of furniture. I like doing that. I almost took a job doing it after college. Driving around in a van assembling people’s ikea shelves. That would’ve been fun.
